Description: A crude blade made from sticky sap-covered wood, barely holding its shape. A humble beginning for any adventurer.
A sturdy sword gleaming with goo, crafted by novice slime smiths. Its bronze edge reflects the maker's care.
Forged with reinforced iron and solidified ooze, this blade is dependable in battle.
A sharp blade forged from alloyed metals, layered with protective slime. It shines with an industrial elegance.
Cloaked in shadowy energy, this blade seems to absorb light. Perfect for those who fight in the dark.
A mithril blade covered in enchanted muck, glowing faintly under moonlight. A rarity among skilled crafters.
This radiant blade is forged from adamant and glowing slime, making it both beautiful and powerful.
A chilling blade of frozen ooze Crystal. It freezes the air around it and leaves frost on its enemies.
Forged with molten slime and fire shards, this blade burns with an inner inferno, igniting its surroundings.
Polished to a mirror finish, this relic blade carries the wisdom of forgotten eras.
Jagged and ominous, this weapon leaks molten ooze through its fiery cracks. It pulses with unstable power.
Studded with corundum gems, this light purple sword refracts light, creating a dazzling visual display.
A vibrant green sword made from augite and enriched with nature’s purest slime essence.
Forged from celestial Ore, this weapon resonates with divine energy, offering both grace and devastation.
A blade forged in the depths, steeped in dark energy and abyssal slime, emanating a sinister glow.
A spectral blade forged from brumite, leaving an eerie mist in its path as it chills the very soul.
This shadowy weapon seems alive, constantly reforming its edge with seeping twilight goo.
With each strike, this silver blade drains vitality, powered by the mysterious properties of witherite ooze.
This blade warps reality around it, its netherite core glowing with void-infused slime energy.
A pulsating orb of primordial slime, its dark purple glow radiates infinite possibilities and untapped power.
A basic longbow made from sticky sap wood. It barely holds tension but works in a pinch.
A sturdy longbow reinforced with bronze elements and sticky ooze for improved elasticity.
An iron-tipped longbow strung with hardened ooze fiber, delivering reliable accuracy.
A bow forged with mixed metals, with a slime-coated grip for enhanced handling.
Crafting Materials:
15 Bronze Ores
15 Iron Ores
10 Wood
10 Dacron

Description: A shadow-infused longbow, silent and lethal. Perfect for precise strikes in the dark.
Crafted from mithril and enchanted muck, this longbow glimmers faintly in the moonlight.
A radiant longbow that emits a soft glow, perfect for sharp and piercing shots.
A bow of frozen Crystal, releasing arrows that chill enemies to the bone.
Forged with molten slime and fire shards, this longbow ignites its projectiles with searing flames.
A relic from a forgotten era, this longbow holds ancient secrets within its polished frame.
A jagged and ominous longbow that leaks molten ooze through its fiery cracks.
Decorated with corundum gems, this longbow dazzles foes with its radiant beauty.
A green bow imbued with augite's natural energies, perfectly balanced for precision shooting.
A celestial longbow forged from sanctum ore, resonating with divine energy for otherworldly accuracy.
Forged in the depths, this longbow emanates dark energy from its abyssal components.
A longbow crafted with brumite, shrouded in spectral mist, chilling enemies from afar.
Crafting Materials:
60 Brumite Ores
35 Ice Ooze Crystals
15 Dyneema

Description: A bow of twilight energy, constantly reforming its tension with flowing goo.
Strung with witherite fibers, this bow drains vitality with every shot.
A void-powered bow infused with netherite, bending reality with its projectiles.
A basic staff made of sticky sap-covered wood. A humble tool for novice casters.
A sturdy staff capped with bronze and goo, channeling magical energies efficiently.
Iron strengthened with solidified ooze, providing stability for focused spells.
A staff forged from mixed metals and layered with protective slime, perfect for amplifying spells.
Cloaked in shadowy energy, this staff whispers incantations of darkness to its wielder.
Enchanted muck adorns this mithril staff, glowing faintly under mystical light, amplifying arcane potential.
A radiant staff glowing with slime energy, ideal for illuminating magical paths.
A staff crafted from frozen ooze Crystal, chilling the air and channeling frost magic.
Forged with molten slime and fire shards, this staff channels fiery energy into devastating spells.
Polished to perfection, this relic staff holds the knowledge of a forgotten era, amplifying arcane power.
A jagged staff that seeps molten slime through its fiery cracks, radiating chaotic magical energy.
Studded with corundum gems, this staff dazzles with refracted magical energies, making it both functional and beautiful.
A vibrant green staff imbued with augite essence, perfect for nurturing nature-based magic.
Forged from celestial Ore, this staff resonates with divine energy, offering unmatched grace and power.
A staff forged from abyssium, channeling deep and foreboding energies for powerful dark spells.
Shrouded in ethereal mist, this brumite staff chills the soul and amplifies spectral magic.
A staff of twilight energy, constantly shifting and reforming with seeping slime.
This witherite staff drains life energy, enhancing dark magic spells with every use.
A staff forged with netherite, bending reality to unleash void-powered spells.
A helm infused with shadowed energy, radiating an aura of corruption and decay.
A sleek and ethereal helm crafted from voidium, granting enhanced agility and perception.
A heavy helm forged from concentrated voidium, exuding an unearthly and intimidating presence.
A protective helm forged by the ancient Vorloran, symbolizing resilience and vigilance.
This helm sharpens awareness, allowing its wearer to detect unseen threats with ease.
A hood woven with eldritch threads, crackling with chaotic magic for arcane defense and power.
A light crown blessed by unseen winds, offering unmatched grace and agility to its wearer.
A crown imbued with eternal frost, protecting the wearer with icy resilience.
A sturdy helm rooted in the strength of the earth, granting steadfast protection.
Forged in molten fire, this fiery helm emanates the raw rage of Ragnar’s forge.
A corrupted armor forged from shadowed materials, emanating an aura of decay.
A sleek armor made of voidium, designed for agility and enhanced with ethereal energy.
A heavy armor forged from condensed voidium, radiating an intimidating and otherworldly presence.
Forged by the ancient Vorloran, this plate embodies strength and resilience in battle.
This armor sharpens its wearer’s awareness, aiding in detecting unseen threats.
Arcane robes crackling with chaotic magic, favored by spellcasters seeking unbridled power.
A light and graceful armor, blessed by unseen winds to grant unparalleled mobility in combat.
Infused with eternal frost, this plate can freeze incoming strikes, making its wearer nearly untouchable.
A sturdy plate forged from the strongest earthly materials, offering unshakable defense in any encounter.
Born from the molten core of Ragnar’s forge, this armor burns with the rage of a thousand flames.
A basic shield of slimewood, perfect for beginners.
Reinforced with slime-bronze, offering reliable protection.
Made with hardened materials to endure greater impacts.
A balanced shield forged with slime-alloy for versatility.
Shadowy and sleek, ideal for silent defenders.
Crafted from resilient muckstone, unusually tough.
Radiates protective light, instilling courage in its wielder.
A frosty shield that chills attackers upon impact.
Burns brightly, deflecting attacks with fiery resilience.
A relic of old, emanating ancient defensive power.
Forged with dragon’s magma shards, unbreakable and fierce.
Crafted from glittering Crystal, as tough as it is radiant.
Enriched with lush, green Crystal of unparalleled strength.
A shield of holy power, blessed with sanctified slime.
A dark shield imbued with chaotic abyssal energies.
Flickering with faint light, mysterious and graceful.
Forged in twilight, carrying the essence of dusk.
Draws strength from those it deflects, eerie and powerful.
Rips through reality, forged from the Nether’s essence.
A legendary shield, said to be forged from the core of slimes.
A slimy, flexible mantle offering basic protection.
Bronze-threaded and durable, guarding its wearer.
Iron-fortified fibers providing excellent defense.
A dark and flowing cape, perfect for evasion.
A lush, nature-inspired design, blending protection and grace.
A glowing cape, guiding its wearer through the darkest paths.
A frosted design, resistant to the coldest environments.
Ablaze with fiery hues, protecting against searing heat.
Ethereal and mysterious, its threads shimmer with light.
A legendary artifact, radiating pure slime energy.
A radiant moonstone gem that emanates soft brilliance, gently enhancing the flow of every action.
Refined with celestial energy, this amulet imbues its wearer with unmatched grace and efficiency.
A darkly luminous relic that channels the moon’s quiet strength, quickening every effort.
Polished to perfection, this artifact transforms work into art, granting seamless motion to all tasks.
The pinnacle of moonstone craftsmanship, this amulet blends light and shadow to create mastery beyond mortal limits.
A glimmering nightopal amulet, cloaked in twilight, it amplifies creation with an enigmatic aura.
Charged with cosmic energy, this pendant magnifies fortune, doubling the bounty of all endeavors.
Forged in secret rites, this pendant draws from hidden depths, ensuring abundance in every outcome.
Etched with forbidden glyphs, this charm turns the ordinary into the extraordinary, multiplying rewards effortlessly.
A relic of ultimate power, this nightopal core merges shadow and mystery to unlock boundless prosperity for its bearer.
